lead_paragraph: A trial is to begin on July 9 for Francesco Schettino, captain of the Costa Concordia, which ran aground off Tuscany in January 2012, killing 32.
snippet: A trial is to begin on July 9 for Francesco Schettino, captain of the Costa Concordia, which ran aground off Tuscany in January 2012, killing 32....
abstract: Italian judge orders Francesco Schettino, captain of cruise ship Costa Concordia, to stand trial on manslaughter and other charges related to deadly capsizing of vessel off coast of Tuscany in January 2012.

headline.main: Manslaughter Trial Is Set for Captain of Liner That Capsized Off Italy, Killing 32
headline.seo: Costa Concordia Captain to Be Tried for Manslaughter
headline.print_headline: Manslaughter Trial Is Set for Captain of Liner That Capsized Off Italy, Killing 32
